events.title: Century Square Social
events.description: A casual evening social gathering at Century Square, bringing AFL members together for fellowship and community building as we resumed in-person activities with appropriate safety measures.

gallery.alt: Group of seven AFL members posing together at Century Square during an evening social, with string lights and brick wall in background

events.title: Big Event Volunteering
events.description: AFL members participated in Texas A&M's Big Event, the largest one-day student-run service project in the nation. Following COVID-19 safety protocols, our members helped local residents with yard work, landscaping, and home improvement projects, demonstrating our continued commitment to community service even during challenging times.

gallery.alt: AFL members wearing masks and gloves doing landscaping work around a brick house during The Big Event 2021

events.title: Member Retreat
events.description: A day of team building, organization planning, and fellowship for AFL members, strengthening our bonds and planning future initiatives.

events.title: Grand Station Social
events.description: An evening of fun and games at Grand Station Entertainment, celebrating the end of the spring semester and our successful return to in-person activities.

events.title: Prancing for Prosthetics 5K 2021
events.description: Prancing For Prosthetics is Aggies For Limbs annual 5K. The fun run is held every December on Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun Christmas-themed run to raise money for Ashton's Angels. 100% of proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
features: Dress up in your favorite Christmas gear
Treats to fill your belly after you run

schedule.notes: Please allow some time to check in, lines can be long. Parking will be in Lot 50, near the ETB (Emerging Technology Building) on the northside of campus, right next to the starting point of the race.

options.name: Early Bird Ticket
options.description: Includes guaranteed t-shirt, race entry, and access to all food and drinks

options.name: General Admission
options.description: Includes race entry and access to all food and drinks (t-shirt not guaranteed)

outcome.achievement: Successfully raised over $8,000 for prosthetic care

gallery.alt: Race finish line with Prancing for Prosthetics banner and inflatable arch, showing young participants with race numbers
AFL volunteers in Christmas costumes - one as an elf and one as Olaf the snowman directing runners
Group photo of AFL members and participants at the 2021 Prancing for Prosthetics event
